name: Heart Eat Serious Game
description: Heart-EAT is a serious game, which aims to give a knowledge of the right foods based on two main factors of cardiovascular disease (CVD); cholesterol level and overweight status. This 2D adventure game allows the player to control the action of a character in order to achieve specific learning objectives. The objectives of the game are to eat healthy foods and avoid unhealthy foods in order to avoid the increasing level of cholesterol and controlling their weight. This game was embedded with intelligent support system to help the player making decision of their food intake. The intelligent act as a narrative NPC.
